alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:01PM EDT until May 21 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL...SOUTHEASTERN MCCRACKEN AND NORTHEASTERN GRAVES COUNTIES... At 300 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Reidland, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Paducah around 305 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Reidland and Calvert City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 9 and 29. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 48 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
